headline: Is PG&E (PCG) Pricing Reflect Its Mixed Returns And California Regulatory Risks?
summary: If you are trying to work out whether PG&E at around US$15.78 is a bargain or just fairly priced, you will want a clear view of what the current valuation actually reflects. The stock has had a mixed run, with a 0.4% return over the past week and 3.3% over the last 30 days, while year to date returns are a 3.0% decline and the 1 year return sits at a 6.2% decline, compared with a 3 year return of 3.4% and a 5 year return of 33.1%. Recent headlines around PG&E have continued to focus on the...
